name: Tapventures
description:
Tap the screen repeatedly to kill the monsters

Tapventures is an RPG that's very similar to other clickers. In it your goal is to go different places annihilating all the monsters you can find by quickly and repeatedly tapping the screen.

As you kill monsters, others with more life points will appear. Fortunately, each time you kill a monster, it drops coins you can pick up and use to increase the damage you do with your taps. You can also unlock other features, such as friends who inflict a fixed amount of damage every second.

You'll find the real challenge in Tapventures in the bosses. These creatures have loads of life points, and you have to beat them within a fixed amount of time. If you can't get their health to zero before time runs out, you'll have to start the fight again.

Tapventures is a simple and addictive game. It's not very original, but still offers an excellent gaming experience, with graphics that are really nice and polished.
